desmoj.extensions.experimentation.ui

Class AttributeTableEditor.TextBasedEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.extensions.experimentation.ui.AttributeTableEditor.TextBasedEditor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeTableEditor.AttribEditor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AttributeTableEditor.FloatingPointNumberEditor, AttributeTableEditor.IntegerNumberEditor, AttributeTableEditor.StringEditor
    Enclosing class:
    AttributeTableEditor

    public static class AttributeTableEditor.TextBasedEditor
extends java.lang.Object
implements AttributeTableEditor.AttribEditor
    A default text editor consisting of a single TextField. Can edit all data types with a constructor whose single argument is a String.

      • createFormat

        protected java.text.Format createFormat()
        Returns null as an empty format. Subclasses can override this method to implement formats the edited text is validated against.
        Returns:
        a new Format

      • getFormat

        public java.text.Format getFormat()
        Returns:
        the format used by this editor to validate text entries.

      • setValue

        public void setValue(java.lang.Object value)
        Sets the text fields value to the given value. If the value is null the text field is initialized with an empty string
        Specified by:
        setValue in interface AttributeTableEditor.AttribEditor
        Parameters:
        object - to init textfield with

      • getValue

        public java.lang.Object getValue()
        Returns the value from the text field as an object of the current edited class. Tries to create an object by invoking the current class' constructor with a single String argument. If this action fails null is returned.
        Specified by:
        getValue in interface AttributeTableEditor.AttribEditor
        Returns:
        edited object
